messages.subject: damage counters and D&D
messages.msgSnippet: ... Actually, these are bigger than damage counters. They re about an inch and a quarter across. Speaking of gaming kids though, Conor has been participating
messages.messageBody:
><< They used those clear glass "stones" that you get in the
>floral dept. of craft stores. (Sometimes people put them in the botton of
>vases to hold up artificial flowers.) >>
>
>"Damage counters.">>

Actually, these are bigger than damage counters. They're about an inch and a
quarter across.

Speaking of gaming kids though, Conor has been participating in his first
D&D games these past few weekends. He's playing with several of our adult
friends and I'm in unschooling mom heaven. :o) The amount of thinking,
imagining, creativity, math, writing, and who knows what else is amazing. Oh
yeah, he's liking it too. ;-)

Our friends told us that they are all going to chip in to get Conor an
"apprentice geek" t-shirt.

Life is good.
~Mary
